entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the morning. A few rain showers beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
